channel.title: Release on Claire Radel Fans
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Claire Radel Fans

item.title: To You
item.description: Releases # more Behind the Scene # Some quick behind the scenes in the studio for my upcoming song “To You”!

item.title: No Victory
item.description: Releases # more ## Lives Live - March, 26 2020 # Alright, so, I’m gonna start off with my newer original song, uh, that I co-wrote this with Marcus Waddell, um, and he is an Indianapolis-based producer, songwriter, um, and he’s been really great to work with, uh, so far, and, um, I’ve got two songs, uh, three songs that we’ve written, two of them I’ll be releasing, uh, sometime this year, so stay tuned, I’m really excited, and, um, this is one of them, and it is called, um, No Victory.

item.title: Looking No More
item.description: Releases # more Behind the Scene # Looking No More - Behind the scenes @ Court Street Recording # The official behind the scenes video of “Looking No More” recording session - Claire Radel and Michael Estok @ Court Street Recording.

item.title: The One
item.description: Releases # more ## Lives Live - April 15, 2023 # Um, I’m gonna play The One, um, which was my last release, and this song is the song that got me my first sync licensing deal with Film and TV, and um, which is super cool.

item.title: Something People Say
item.description: This song is written by Claire

item.title: Not What I Want
item.description: Releases # more Lives # Live - November 16, 2019 # And then this is another new song.

item.title: Guilitine
item.description: You can here Claire’s voice in the song.

item.title: Like You Love Me
item.description: Releases # more Lives # Live - Nov 16, 2019 # I thought I would do one and give you a little bit of an update on my music.

item.title: You Re Askin for It
item.description: Releases # more Behind The Scenes # THE MAKING OF MY DEBUT EP - October 16, 2018 # I had such a GREAT time making my first EP!

item.title: Your Lovin and You
item.description: Release # more Lives # Orangehaus Music Business Camp - July 17, 2016 # So honored to be chosen for this year’s compilation album at Orangehaus Music Business Camp!
